column2: 5.25 lbs whole grain elbows, rotini, or penne pasta
2 gallons low-fat, low sodium chicken stock
3 lbs medium red bell peppers, diced
6 cups reduced fat cheddar cheese, shredded
1 gallon low-fat, low sodium chicken stock
5 lbs corn (frozen) or 1-5/8, #10 cans corn, drained
Bones, neck, and gizzard from one 5- to 6-pound duck
1/2 medium onion, cut into small dice
2 stalks celery, cut into small dice
2 medium carrots, scraped and cut into small dice
2 cups Chicken Stock or low-salt canned chicken broth
400g tin borlotti beans, drained and rinsed
1 tbsp pickled red or green jalapeño peppers from a jar, roughly chopped
A large bunch of fresh cilantro, leaves picked
A few sprigs of fresh thyme, leaves picked
1/2 cup (125 mL) chopped drained canned tomatoes
2 onions, peeled and cut in 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes
2 carrots, peeled and cut in 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes
2 parsnips, peeled and cut in 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes
2 white summer turnips, peeled and cut in 1-inch (2.5 cm) cubes
Salt  and  freshly  ground  black  pepper
3  cups  turkey  or  chicken  stock,  as  needed
1 onion, peeled and cut in half
2 tablespoons Demerara or granulated brown sugar
